attributes.action: fulfill his promises and started respecting the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 10 June, Prime Minister told parliament that he must fulfill law from the year 1689, The Bill of Rights, and we ask that this public announcment was fulfilled, within a short time period. Even now, it has been dragging for 9 years. We ask him not to allow himself to be influenced by people who can't deal with the idea of righteousness, honor and reigning in benefit of all British People.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please reword your title and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
